course_description:
Engage in statistical study and mentor peers in statistics; attend an orientation, develop mentoring skills, have weekly meetings with lecturer, attend one QTM 100 section per week, and hold mentoring sessions for current students. (2 credits)
OR Aid TA in QTM 100 Lab (1 credit)
